Review.Titre: I don't know why but I had the worst…

When I was buying that hosting I asked one of their agent will I get an SSL certificate for my all domain names or if I had to buy SSL for each domain name on the answer she told me that SSL would be provided with the package. I also had the audio recording of that conversation.But I bought two domains yesterday and didn't get any SSL certificate. when I called them today they said that I have to buy SSL for each of my domains specifically.Isn't it an unethical way to do business by misleading people like this?Please consider my issue as soon as you guys can otherwise I have to complain about you guys.

Review.Titre: I would NEVER recommend using this…
Review.Contenu: I would NEVER recommend using this hosting provider for ANYTHING!! Their dedicated servers are NOT truly dedicated and does not have dedicated IP address?? Not only that but the server I bought never worked right from day one and it has been nothing but a battle trying to get a working server or my money back. I requested a refund for over 8 months worth of charges on a server that did not work properly and was given $200 out of over $1000 charged. IONOS is based in Germany and they have different laws and IONOS is operating their servers under German law and have no regard for U.S Consumer laws. They charge for services they never render properly or never rendered at all. Their website has bugs in it and caused my user table to get corrupted and their response was to create a new account, rather than fix the underlying issue causing the corruption.  I will never again buy anything from this German Company and their customer support is horrendous. You call them when your hosting/services do not work and they blame the customer (I have never seen this from a hosting company before) and tell the customer the configuration of their servers, is on the end user?I am not even sure I want to leave my contract ID for fear of retaliation from IONOS. They have once already illegally locked me out of my data with no prior reasoning or communication. They did not even bother contacting me, that is not happening again. This company needs to be investigated, PRONTO!!

Review.Contenu: I received an invoice from Ionos stating that I was going to be charged for a yearly renewal (which I thought I had already cancelled) so I tried to cancel online but I had to call them in order to do so. After cancelling I received a confirmation via email and thought that it was settled but the next day I was still charged for the invoice which put my bank account in the negative so I had to rush to the bank before work to deposit funds. Then I called customer service again and I was told that they would refund the charge but I only received a partial refund so I had to call them a third time. And for some reason I received the rest of my refund in three separate increments.

Their customer management architecture is from the 2000's.That was the last straw.Oh and they don't offer email support or at least it doesn't show up on their website. Yes, they really are a business from the 2000's.IONOS is going backwards. Good riddance really. I'm happy with porkbun.

Review.Titre: IF YOU YOU NEED A LITTLE PAIN IN YOUR…
Review.Contenu: IF YOU YOU NEED A LITTLE PAIN IN YOUR LIFE SIGN UP TO IONOSI have been with them for years (opened an account in France over a decade ago). I have since had just about every issue possible with them. Most recently Visa declined automatic payment because of a security breach they discovered with Ionos. Since automatic payment was not working we tried calling to pay over the phone. Would you believe that the company does not accept credit card payment and forces you to pay via Paypal? The other alternative is bank transfer. We transferred funds - and 10 days after the transfer, their agents were still unable to see if they had arrived. We created a paypal account especially to pay them a second time and were still told repeatedly that it would take them approx 2 business days to get back to us. In the mean time and despite payment, and our repeated calls, they cancelled our contract (how nice)... I have since spent hours on hold with their agents asking to speak to a manager is like telling them a joke. And now they want more money to retrieve our sites from backup because of the mess they created in the first place. We are agency and sent other companies to IONOS - a very painful experience that looked very bad on us. Steer clear unless you love a struggle.

Review.Titre: IONOS service started amazing BUT…
Review.Contenu: IONOS service started amazing. 24hr support, little to no “hold” times, easy user interface, and great performance regarding e-mail server service. However, when issues began to surface with Outlook compatibility we hit a roadblock. We’ve been working on the issue with IONOS for the past 3 months and the issue remains unresolved. We understand some issues take time but what is the most disappointing is the fact that you CANNOT talk to any supervisor or  level 2 engineer, even though your issue has been assigned to them. And to be clear, we support this protocol however when an issue remains unresolved for months on end, it may make sense to pivot.  Through this experience we also realized IONOS struggles with continuity. Every call is with someone new. It would make more sense to wait until the same representative is available. IONOS offers great products/service WHEN they work. However, if you’re looking for customer support and the ability to talk to a supervisor/engineer, you may be best served with another company.

Review.Titre: NO NO NO to IONOS
Review.Contenu: I recently tried to get out of a hosting plan I no longer needed but decided to keep my domain registrations with Ionos. Big mistake. I talked to customer support and clearly cancelled these other services, yet they keep charging me for them. They love to bury your information in "contracts" that are impossible to understand, and seem to throw in random charges just for the hell of it. Unfortunately, they have no live text chat support but you can call their support line (a number listed without any breaks or punctuation, likely to make you hesitant to dial or just because it's some weird standard based on their German roots) where you'll be put on hold with annoying distorted music obviously intended to make you hang up. After a long wait, I finally got someone on the phone and actually felt sorry for the agent having to take calls from customers angry over her employer's incompetence and fraud. She said she would take care of the problem and issue a refund, but because they didn't follow through last time, I'll believe it when I see it. Learn from my mistake and stay far, far away from these scam-meisters. If I could give them a negative five stars, I would.

Review.Titre: IONOS used to be amazing, but steer clear.
Review.Contenu: IONOS used to be amazing. I've hosted dozens of domains with them for over a decade. After paying the company thousands of dollars and having never had an issue with billing, they suddenly sent my account to collections and cancelled my contact when my credit card expired. I come to find out that they were sending notices to an old email address I had on file.  I had changed that email address to a new one, but sounds like the change didn't stick or they ignored this change.  I called their 1800 number and the agent spoke with me for a few minutes, then without saying anything put me on hold. That was 15 minutes ago. Every few mins I heard a number pressed, but nobody is returning to the line. I feel disrespected. I finally called back and connected to Kim who was able to find my domains and help me transfer them out of IONOS.I will never do business with this company again. They turned me from from a happy customer who has sent them a lot of referrals over the years into an unhappy one.

Review.Titre: Poor UI/UX
Review.Contenu: Their interface is extremely convoluted and confusing, with things in places that make zero sense. Locating services to manage them is difficult, and identifying contracts and what's contained in them is difficult.Want to cancel your contract? Better make sure it's not just the domain that no longer resides with them! "You canceled just your domain," I'm told. How can I cancel a domain that doesn't exist with you? I moved it to an entirely different registrar. Am I just getting old and confused by things? Perhaps. But I consider myself pretty capable after being in tech for the past 15 years. They need to tighten up the process and make it more clear on what is happening. If I'm canceling contract # 123456, that better be for the entire thing, not the $7 piece that no longer exists in their environment.

Review.Titre: I forgot to use a referral link
Review.Contenu: I forgot to use my friend's referral link and will have to cancel to get it associated correctly. I'm trying to cancel, that is to say. The cancellations department is overwhelmed and after 2 transfers I ended up hanging up and sending an email.If this was not my fault I'd have given 1 star. It is a frustrating experience to have to cancel just to get an account referral straightened out.Bumping it down to 2 stars for the hassle it takes leaving a review.

Review.Titre: Worst call center of people!!!! Insulted me calling me a liar.
Review.Contenu: Worst call center of people who don't listen to anything I'm saying and just let me go on and on about everything to just tell me every thing I just told them and for them to tell me they have no idea what they are doing and won't tell me what they can do for me only what they can't i swear they work for tmobile too it was a nightmare with the same type of help from call center. I paid $12 for the website builder plus for the year this is after I thought I purchaced it the day before but my card was never charged so I did make sure it went through this time and I was doing fine designing my site then I hit publish and went out of the editor for a minute and when I went to go back to it I was unable to locate the page and when I was suppose to be redirected to it, then it just never did. I'm unable to find away back to edit my site that I was working on and Noone seems to understand anything I tell them and proceeds to insult me with making me repeat myself over and over and being treated like I'm dumb and that it's my fault and then I was a liar when I told the guys I purchaced the web builder and he told me "no you didn't" I have PROOF ON MY CREDIT CARD. I've never been treated so badly and like I was a liar like that before. I'm beyond upset and I'm afraid to call again to get this resolved because I'm not going to be treated like I know what I'm talking about and I'll have to sit through someone ignoring everything I said and then tell me I didn't purchase anything and it's not showing in my account which I know all this, I called to tell you that and for you to figure it out. I was also denied my request for a supervisor when he refused to find my credit card that was charged in your system for the web builder because I wanted him to find the proof and paper trail of my purchase to find out why its not showing in my account I was denied any type of effort or remedy to my issues. I can only imagine what today is going to be like when I call.

Review.Titre: Slow webmail, useless editor, slow or no fixes, just sad
Review.Contenu: Terrible hosting if you intend on having a website with good traffic. Having opened multiple websites due to the low prices, I have begun to migrate every single one of them. One more is left and I need to migrate it asap. The problems start with the domain hosting itself. When I use the Wordpress editor there is 500 Error for over a month. Customer support can reproduce it and they provide a temporary solution which is also frustrating to use. The webmail is terribly slow on forwarding essential emails and the process to reach your inbox is like hunting treasure with a treasure map lolFixes are extremely slow, but charges to your card are perfectly on time though.

Review.Titre: I registered my domain yesterday as a…
Review.Contenu: I registered my domain yesterday as a package deal. I received a confirmation and all of a sudden my domain is no longer a part of my portfolio? So I had to pay another $10 to retrieve it. Really Ionos it is best to practice what you advertise and confirm.

Review.Titre: Avoid if possible…
Review.Contenu: Service is fairly cheap for the first year. But aft wards it gets pricey. No refunds on services you no longer want. Control panel is complicated. Hosting service is even more complicated... Recommendation: Register your domain and then transfer it to a hosting provider that has cpanel...

Review.Titre: I am a new customer
Review.Contenu: I am a new customer. I do not have any experience with IONOS, yet.But I see that IONOS has no 24/7 Support Team. Like this time, I have to wait till 9:00pm CST and at your site will be 9:00am EST. Which at this time sometimes, I am going to bed already.

Review.Titre: Always upselling you
Review.Contenu: Always upselling you, always making you dig into fine print to get things like PHP Extended Support removed.... The best help I received from them was from their Facebook / Social Media Team. But every time I log into Ionos to buy another domain, I worked up because I know I'll have to go looking for whatever bloat they are selling me behind the scenes.

Review.Titre: There are a few TRICKS when I try to…
Review.Contenu: There are a few TRICKS when I try to renew my domain. The renew gets automatically reset to 2 years , instead of the 1 year I always choose. Also, Auto-renew gets set back on, when I NEVER choose auto-renew. I then have to go into the setting to change it. However, it tells me that changing the settings is temporarily down, so I have to wait a day and come back. If I find a company that doesn't employ this tricks, I'm transferring my domain.

Review.Titre: Refunded
Review.Contenu: Edited: Thanks to Tara Willis who assisted in getting me a refund. Wish it was done before needing to write such a negative review. I’ve added a star for the effort to help satisfy this unhappy customer. Hopefully Ionos will improve the way they do some things. Thiefs & liars is all I can say. Charged me for a domain that I transfered and said it renewed before the transfer. Then I refused to pay they blocked my account which still had another domain of mine. Then the story changed and they said the charges is for the remaining domain and they will unblock account. Paid the amount. Could still not get into account and then got notice that the remaining domain is due for renewal. I tranfered immediately but still was out $15 which was supposed to be for that domain.

Review.Titre: Do not buy
Review.Contenu: Their prices are really good but do not buy into the hype! As soon as I made a purchase they put it on hold and requested immense amounts of documents and IDs... never seen before on any host. they give FAX as option in 2021! They collect huge amount of data (even entering your account settings is a chore as they require additional data)Their customer support helped with understanding what was wrong with my account well so one star goes to them. Not so blazing fast but OK.

Review.Titre: your services are good
Review.Contenu: your services are good, however the billing and the contract set up is not customer friendly.  i have inquired about having all of my contracts combined to on single due date and was told that I would have to redo all of my contracts.

Review.Titre: The performance checker is either fake…
Review.Contenu: The performance checker is either fake or does not work, I have linked my site to other sites, and have many likes on Facebook but it shows none. Then all the site does is offer me more things to buy as if I don't already have this working. I have contacted Google and yelp and other sites on my own to check these facts, Bing is another that helps. I get better information off Google and Bing for free the Ionos for pay. I have 2 sites on here. So my overall opinion is you don't supply your clients with truthful information. I company would think you would want your clints to be at the top of the list.

Review.Titre: Yesterday the system would not even…
Review.Contenu: Yesterday the system would not even allow me to register new domains. Errorcode: 103001. Today I have screenshots that it SAYS it was successful but it still froze, got caught in a loop when I was trying to purchase through shopping cart, and now domain isn't even showing up in domain list.

Review.Titre: your system took my oldest info and…
Review.Contenu: your system took my oldest info and prefilled the domain registrar with that. I tried to change it before the order, but still it did not allow me to do so, when I unchecked "use this info with your registrar" it took me to a new page to add the new address info, but when finishing it took again the old information and did not allow me to change it. Either I start the process again and enter the same loop, or I lose the domain, had to accept the wrong information. Improve your system forms!

Review.Titre: Difficulty processing my payments both…
Review.Contenu: Difficulty processing my payments both for recurring payments (it assumes if my card bounces a payment I must have a new card because well aren't we all perfect in times of corona?) and doesn't auto attempt again it sends it to collections, or for new payments (the website just backtracks for everything if you miss a single section and you end up doing everything like 5 times to complete it.

Review.Titre: Too much "Don't you want to buy more" screens
Review.Contenu: I have used 1and1/ionos for years, but today when I needed to register a new domain, I hit a dead end on their iPhone app. Could add to cart, but could not buy. So I went to full computer to purchase, and it forced me to click through 5 or 6 screens of "don't you want to buy something else" screens before finally completing the purchase.It is not a good idea to annoy your long-term customers.

Review.Titre: Your website is VERY confusing
Review.Contenu: Your website is VERY confusing. I have never understood how to navigate it, order new products, make changes to existing products that I have. I can't even find out a clear idea of what products I am paying for and what they do. Nothing about your site makes any sense.

Review.Titre: Pros & Cons.  Summary: Up-sell nightmare navigating site.
Review.Contenu: Pros:Low/competitive pricing for basic hosting services.Cons:Navigating the site & control panel to do basic things to set up is a total nightmare- you have constantly dodge subtle up-sells for every action, and backtrack.  I do not recommend this service others trying to make their own site, unless they are an expert.  Even then  I still dont recommend.  too much time has been wasted navigating and dodging up-sells

Review.Titre: 1&1 used to feel like the maverick of…
Review.Contenu: 1&1 used to feel like the maverick of the web space to me. Not anymore. The website is slow, cumbersome and excruciating to use. This is 2020. No registrar of domain names should be oblivious to their own web presence. The only reason I came back to ionos.com is because I have secured other web addresses with them from the past. I know it's not necessary, but it makes record-keeping simpler. I have no reason to recommend their services above  anyone else's right now. I wish I did.

Review.Titre: I almost accidentally agreed to private…
Review.Contenu: I almost accidentally agreed to private registration because you try to push the add on features. When I want to buy a URL, I just want the URL. I don't want to struggle how to buy something when I am paying for a service. Make it easy and clear what I am getting and if you want to offer add on products, fine, but make it easy and clear how to simply buy what you desire without confusion.

Review.Titre: Good prices but poor service at front end
Review.Contenu: Good prices. Poor service at front end. The agents over the weekend on Customer Service line gave me incorrect information about plan term length that I could get longer if i called back to speak to retention. Agent this morning was abrupt and not helpful. I cannot readily navigate page to find the product type names and she wouldn't probe to assist.

Review.Titre: Easy to set up an account, misleading time frame
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up an account, but the sales pitch is misleading.  They say a VPS can be set up in about 55 seconds.  When you get through the payment and log in to your account, that 55 seconds turns in to 48 hours.I will give them credit for quickly answering questions on the phone before ordering a VPS.  If their support is as good after the fact, then I'll be impressed.

Review.Titre: I wanted a separate package
Review.Contenu: I wanted a separate package, separate credit card and name information and something easy to use and all my domains are together. Now I probably have to call to try and get it separated if possible. This is a separate business with different names. I thought that when I logged in that I would have a choice to go to one or the other package but they are all together. Also, to even send an opinion you have to jump through hoops.

Review.Titre: I am very confused about this and don't…
Review.Contenu: I am very confused about this and don't understand what I am paying for.  i feel like I was talked into this by the person who contacted me and I have no idea what I am doing and what this does for me.  I just want my Etsy shop to be able to be found using this domain name and not my old domain name.  I hope I am no longer paying for two domain names and I think I am.  I am so confused.

Review.Titre: Link to my.ionos.com
Review.Contenu: There needs to be a link to get back to Websites & Stores and other My.Ionos.com products after a purchase. I noted this link was not available on the customized view, which shows my order confirmation. I also noted that I was signed out of Ionos.com after I made a domain name purchase.  This is inconvenient and should be addressed.

Review.Titre: Ionos Customer Service is Poor
Review.Contenu: I was trying to downgrade my service and I tried twice contacting customer service and while their email responses were full of helpful attitude they ultimately failed to do anything.  I finally figured out how to do it myself on their web site without as much as a pointer on where to start.  The only thing that keeps me with them is the hassle to change over my domain to another provider.  Fortunately their price is competitive within the industry, otherwise I would have changed for sure.

Review.Titre: Been with 1&1 for about 10 years now
Review.Contenu: Been with 1&1 for about 10 years now - I've slowly been migrating my domains to another company - I'll be glad when I'm done with them - customer service is horrible, websites are slow, control page is a mess, basic things don't work (I can't even update my address because the 1&1 database thinks it knows my address better than I and won't allow a suite number).  I'll be so glad when I'm done with 1&1.

Review.Titre: Hard to find domain tools that allow…
Review.Contenu: Hard to find domain tools that allow you to manage payments.  If you don't know where they are, you have to wade through a bunch of sales pitches to find anything.  Also, if you want to disable the auto-renewal on a domain, the tool is not always available.  I'm not real crazy about the way they run their business.

Review.Titre: Ionos switched me to an 'upgraded' plan…
Review.Contenu: Ionos switched me to an 'upgraded' plan (more expensive) without my input. Suddenly I had a project. I expect any provider to make my job easier. The website hosting is fine, but the control panel could be easier to use. Changing my plan and price without my input is not an outstanding move.

Review.Titre: Forced to Upgrade?
Review.Contenu: I feel like I've been strong-armed into upgrading my shop.  I'm a new business owner and just starting out and because I want to enter the dimensions on my items in order to accurately reflect shipping for my customers, I'm forced to upgrade yet AGAIN.  At this juncture, it seems more prudent to leave and go to Shopify, as they charge $29/month for their basic package and I don't have this bait and switch stuff to deal with.  I've used Ionos for years, and I'm happy with everything, despite the learning curve, but today I'm upset with how I was misled to think this plan would help me launch a business.

Review.Titre: Expensive and do not give the option to…
Review.Contenu: Expensive and do not give the option to protect our information from the worldwide webWhen signing up did not give a 3 yr renewal option - only 1 year - interface could be more intuitive

Review.Titre: Generally good
Review.Contenu: Generally good - although twice in the last week when I tried to 'check-out', my order (using Firefox) produced an error and I lost all my order details and had to start all over using MS Edge - this worked - but obviously there is system-error condition at work ?!?

Review.Titre: Hinderance in order process
Review.Contenu: My contact information was shown incorrectly even after correcting it. The order feature also needs to be adjusted to allows customers to correct information at the order page if incorrect as opposed to removing all items from their cart and starting again.

Review.Titre: Prices for services change every day
Review.Contenu: Prices for services change every day, if you want services for a long time, I highly do not recommend ionos, ordering a service today for $ 1 after the completion of a contract, the cost of this service may increase several times, and if you have an automatic payment you will lose your money

Review.Titre: Interface is not what you would…
Review.Contenu: Interface is not what you would expect...I ordered one domain and then I also ordered business web hosting because they were doing a promotion for $1 plus a free domain. The domains were set up fast as well as the web server, only to find that they were experiencing web host issues and some users websites were unavailable.. Overall the interface was clunky, slow, and basic. Does not even have actual cpanel. I had to cancel within a half hour after placing my order. Now I am waiting for my domain to be available so that I can repurchase at GoDaddy.

Review.Titre: I got some great deal but pricing is…
Review.Contenu: I got some great deal but pricing is not transparent and it's impossible to search for the same package that I used already. I clicked on a domain. Once to purchase and there was an affordable cost. I tried it again and it gave me the domain for free. This see fishy to me.

Review.Titre: First..when i call and try to get help…
Review.Contenu: First..when i call and try to get help and i get a team member of my consultant Tom whoever.  The men i have talked to talk to me like im stupid. One said to call back when i baaically get it together before i call back. SecondYour site is a lil confusing

Review.Titre: It's not fair to pay again an ionos domain to be migrated
Review.Contenu: I didn't know was necessary to pay again when the domain is going to be migrated to another ionos account In spite of I have paid all the year the domain before from the original ionos account.I don't think is fair.

Review.Titre: Been with ionos/1and1 for years
Review.Contenu: Been with ionos/1and1 for years - they keep making contract changes without advance notice and make it difficult to change contracts without effecting other contracts and other domains.  Would not recommend.

Review.Titre: i can´t pay using my international…
Review.Contenu: i can´t pay using my international prepayd card ( mastercard ) i can´t select a new contract and so, i can´t have all benefits for 1 year free domain and 1 month U$ 1,00 web host. i don´t know whats happen.thank you

Review.Titre: The 1&1 IONOS  control panel is very…
Review.Contenu: The 1&1 IONOS  control panel is very slow. Domain cancelations are near impossible. I have used them for 13 years and have somewhere between 50 and 100 domains with them, including hosting and email accounts. So I don't want to migrate away. However, I would not recommend them anymore. I wish they would improve their control panel speed and stop making it so difficult to turn off the auto-renew on domains.They do offer good customer support. They are always quick to fix my issues or answer my questions. Though they always seem a little annoyed when I call. I just have to remind myself that they are nerds, not social butterflies.

Review.Titre: While registering domains is very easy…
Review.Contenu: I do NOT recommend their Hosting serviceWhile registering domains is very easy and reasonably priced the actual management of those domains once you purchase them is made incredibly difficult if you also use their hosting services.

Review.Titre: Overcharged significantly without apology or reimbursement
Review.Contenu: The company, first as 1&1 and now as IONOS, billed me for months at different levels FOR THE EXACT SAME SERVICE despite 3 conversations with representatives to stop it (including the support rep who actually discovered the problem and told me about it).  They even twice sent one of my accounts to a collections agency when I wouldn't pay 3 times for the same thing.  To this day I have still not gotten an apology, much less a refund.I rated it 2 stars instead of 1 because they provide a decent technical service.  It is their customer support that failed; outsourced or not (as was their argument) the company is responsible for their representatives actions and decisions.

Review.Titre: Less than thrilled with Ionos
Review.Contenu: I have been using Ionos (previously 1 and 1) for years and find them adequate in most areas. Recently I have been less satisfied with their service. According to their support team, their email system does not support DKIM. This is ridiculous for a business focused provider. DKIM, along with DMARC and SPF are the gold standard for email delivery. Without DKIM configured properly, many MX servers simply drop your email. Almost every email I send to a Gmail user ends up in their SPAM folder. Emails to Microsoft and Outlook.com accounts are  lost completely and never delivered. I am moving my email to another provider and is things don't change I will be moving all my other domains elsewhere as well.

Review.Titre: Hosting packages and webspace are badly…
Review.Contenu: Hosting packages and webspace are badly and confusingly marketed giving misleading information. Webspace packages are poorly explained and require 3rd party hosting which is not explained. Also difficult to navigate and manage.

Review.Titre: It wasn't clear I needed to transfer…
Review.Contenu: It wasn't clear I needed to transfer the domain to another contract to get it to work. You should highlight that better or make the text in that section bigger.

Review.Titre: Their vps are stated as being managed
Review.Contenu: Their vps are stated as being managed. But they aren't.Help with dns as their system doesn't automatically add basic records when you add a domain? No chance. Your site doesn't load despite all configurations and server logs saying all is OK? They ignore you.Canr connect via ftp even though you're using the right settings, no chance. And that's if you can find your ftp login details, as the on site help points to a page in your control panel that doesn't exist. Very good packages, but this is UNMANAGED vps hosting. So if you don't know how to set up plesk and don't want to ssh into apache to sort stuff out, then you're screwed.

Review.Titre: Prices are high and no option for 5 or…
Review.Contenu: Prices are high and no option for 5 or 10 yrs at a discount. Also, I have to order domains one at a time.  Frustrating.....I only go through this website because my son will not let me use Godaddy which I love.

Review.Titre: Customer Service Failed
Review.Contenu: I really did not mind this company until I realized that my payments didn't make it through. Same day my stuff was canceled they gave me the run around, wouldn't let me pay with my card on file and shut me down for days over a simple $16 error. This was no issue to pay but they refused to use the card I had on file and made me go through paypal. In return they shut my site down for 3 days maybe more to verify the funds. While I get it, I don't. It's $16 which is not a lot and it could have easily been handled over the phone but instead they told me the only way was via paypal and a 3 day wait. Now my company and site are down for an entire weekend which are my best times for clients.

Review.Titre: I'm still with them because I do not…
Review.Contenu: I'm still with them because I do not have the time to transfer everything away.  When I do have the time, I will be gone. Too many errors and miscues.  Seems like they are down a lot lately. Not much to keep me here.

Review.Titre: Many many rate changes over the years
Review.Contenu: Many many rate changes over the years. Each change has required losing security features or storage features unless you pay more. Makes it difficult to have confidence in a basic website like a blog or portfolio.

Review.Titre: Buttons don't work sometimes
Review.Contenu: Buttons don't work sometimes. Navigation is unclear.

Review.Titre: I have been with IONOS for many years…
Review.Contenu: I have been with IONOS for many years and never had any problem with their service until recently. I downgraded my package to a less expensive one because I am on a fixed income. They told me they would transfer my files and database to my new package and there would be no extra charge for that. Apparently they didn't transfer all my files which caused my website to not work. After calling them they told me I would have to pay $70 to have my website restored. They are charging me for the mistakes THEY made! I couldn't believe it. It was their responsibility to transfer my files...not mine. Unfortunately I have to pay the fee because I have no other ways to get my files and database. Once my contract with them is up I will be finding a new company to host my website.

Review.Titre: I like the previous version of your…
Review.Contenu: I like the previous version of your website. This one has to many buttons to click to get to where you want, or back to where you started. This was an annoying process today compared to previous purchases.

Review.Titre: Was unable to edit my address during…
Review.Contenu: Was unable to edit my address during purchase.  Will instead need to waste at least a half hour my time and that of customer service do this simple task at a later date.  Simple things should be simple.

Review.Titre: LONG TIME CUSTOMER
Review.Contenu: LONG TIME CUSTOMERDisappointed in receiving no support regarding the referral programme. I have been a ling time customer of 1 and 1 and I have never been informed of a referral programme in which I could earn commission for recommendations. I spoke to customer service who said nothing can be done despite me signing up 4 people in recent months and it needs to be done before. If they are successful recommendations that can be proven I really don't see the difference whether it's done before or after. 1 and 1 just don't want to hold up their end of the bargain.The person I spoke to was happy for me to cancel all my accounts and move on so that's what I'll be doing - I don't know whether to be sad about leaving after years or laugh at the shocking service!

Review.Titre: Manual renew for multiple domains is a pain!
Review.Contenu: Manual renew for multiple domains is a pain! With other providers you can do it in one click. ionos takes forever and thousands of windows.

Review.Titre: The site is not user-friendly
Review.Contenu: The site is not user-friendly, as a website display consultant I found it extremely difficult to navigate through the site.

Review.Titre: The terms of the online store deal were…
Review.Contenu: The terms of the online store deal were unclear and now im paying extra for a domain advertised as a part of the deal for my store.

Review.Titre: Too many upsell options
Review.Contenu: Too many upsell options. Also, the mobile app only partially works when purchasing stuff it wants everything in a desktop layout instead of mobile making it hard to navigate.

Review.Titre: Cancelling unwanted packages (which…
Review.Contenu: Cancelling unwanted packages (which were added when I was not looking) is made difficult. Very slow. The pages are designed to get me mistakenly add packages I don't want or need.

Review.Titre: Why are domains $1 for the first year…
Review.Contenu: Why are domains $1 for the first year before I log-in to my account....but then $10 for the first year after I log-in?

Review.Titre: 6 pages to register a domain because ur…
Review.Contenu: 6 pages to register a domain because ur  trying to pimp all kinds of add ons... Then more ads and more offers.... this is no longer for developers anymore

Review.Titre: Site is not easy to navigate nor user…
Review.Contenu: Site is not easy to navigate nor user friendly I simply wanted to get en email/ Domain name and 45 minutes later I am still trying to verify that it is complete

Review.Titre: 1 week and can't say I'm impressed…
Review.Contenu: I'm a client of IONOS for not even 1 week and I've seen bug over bug with aquiring domain to making a credit card paiement I'm giving them a last chance.

Review.Titre: Your mobile web experience is horrible
Review.Contenu: Your mobile web experience is horrible. In just trying to navigate to see if a domain was available the top menu was blocking my screen and nothing was responsive.

Review.Titre: the most user-unfriendly experience in…
Review.Contenu: the most user-unfriendly experience in my 20+ years of hosting websites for myself and others. I would give 1 star, but for $12/year it was worth trying.Username - u831030261Database name - db646157968etc. - you got the pointFor some reason only one database in MySQL db instanceNo support for PKI (passwordless) authentication. Does *anyone* use passwords any more???And many other weird ways to make user life miserable. I can go on and on!Oh, and for some reason - I am now getting IONOS commercial every 10 minutes.

Review.Titre: Email stopped working after one week.
Review.Contenu: Email stopped working after one week.Will contact them tomorrow and see what's up.

Review.Titre: Help - Not Here!
Review.Contenu: I have several contracts with Ionos - recently I purchased a new domain for an upcoming concert.  For over a week, it has shown I am locked out of the account.  I have called three times, each time given a different story and told to wait.  Today on the third call, the agent said it was an issue on their side, he could not tell me when it would be fixed.  He then stated, and you can probably still go buy that domain ... I bought the domain a week ago......  After advising that was unacceptable - he asked me to hold where I remained for over an hour, never to be reconnected - I have to say customer service with experience - not there.  Non U.S. support centers - they feel is okay to leave you hanging or just not to return to the call.  Now I own a domain (I THINK) and being hosted by IONOS (I THINK) they are having me pay for - when they can't even get it to work.

Review.Titre: IONOS Don't Serve Egypt !
Review.Contenu: IONOS Don't Serve Egypt ! why ?We want to buy a dedicated server from IONOS but we can't because they don't list EGYPT in their registration form.We Know that IONOS is a good company provide high quality, reasonable price and 5 stars support, Hope to see you accept Egypt one day.

Review.Titre: solutions/support take many iterations
Review.Contenu: solutions/support take many iterations; ultimately get solved but in mini-steps with a lot of interaction

Review.Titre: This person was very polite and…
Review.Contenu: This person was very polite and helpful. I would suggest that she get a greater mastery of the English language.

Review.Titre: Hard for new customer
Review.Contenu: Hard for new customer. Support is great.

Review.Titre: Email went down too often
Review.Contenu: Email went down too often. My emails were constantly blocked for spam reasons though I don't use my email for such things. I attempted to convert to a 365 account through Ionos customer support and followed their instructions, however it never worked. Hosting service seemed fine though I felt the price was high for a basic WordPress site. Customer Service, when used, seemed to bounce me around quite a bit. Was a customer for around 20 years but problems and lack of solutions made me search for alternatives.

Review.Titre: The rep great. company policy not so much
Review.Contenu: The rep was absolutely great. I don't like the company raising rates suddenly without any warning.

Review.Titre: The problem of this company is the website
Review.Contenu: The problem of this company is the website.I already noticed that the website of this company dosen't work well and is really fragile and not secure. I will honestly review the website since I found multiple errors:- Logout when the product is clicked - Multiple accounts, accounts based on costumer ID instead of email and with one email you can create thousands of account but still can log in with one without the costumer ID- Difficult to reach the Web Chat to talk to the costumer service. Even thought you can easily call them is hard to find the web chat to talk to the costumer service. Since I will pay to call an American Number I prefer writing but is really hard to find the chat.Even thought the company have some structural errors offers really good products and I will still use them but please fix the errors I showed you.

Review.Titre: Deceptive help and support system
Review.Contenu: You can barely contact customer care. I am unsucessful in many days. I have purchased their plan and this is what their conatct page say. 1. Instead of giving their email id it displays: "Do you doubt the authenticity of an email from IONOS?Check the authenticity of a IONOS email"2. Landphone number without ISD code (They have offices in multiple countries yet do not show ISD code for support staff.3. Live chat (never available): Displays "Temporarily unavailable IONOS Live chatSorry, all our advisers are currently helping other customers. Try again later."Even though I liked their plan and features and the cost, their help and support system is deceptive. They are purposefully avoiding customer contact. You cannot contact them for emergency.

Review.Titre: Order canceled without follow-up
Review.Contenu: Bought yearly plan and was charged for first month, since 2 weeks trying to login without success. Emailed support, no response. I thought they are reputed, but seems it's a scam. Blocked my card, just in case.UPDATE: After submitting my review here, IONOS support emailed me and explained that the contact details I provided were not accepted. The transaction was cancelled. However, I would have appreciated an explanation upfront, there was no follow-up besides the order confirmation. Tank you.

Review.Titre: online better than on the phone
Review.Contenu: the representative was a little confusing and hard to hear. He specifically changed information I had already entered on the web. I am happy with the current promotion but that took a half hour for no reason. Also CashApp cards not being accepted should mcome up as a warning.

Review.Titre: Web is brilliant
Review.Contenu: Web is brilliant, but getting to talk to tech support people who are fully trained did not work out.  This was my first call, so I am going to call back and try again, hopefully with someone else.

Review.Titre: I love that I can talk to a real person…
Review.Contenu: I love that I can talk to a real person and get answers and help. Aysaha is great and helpful. Not happy with the fact that what I saw advertised online was a $1.00 a month for a yr and then $12. a month the following year and the contract sent to me says, $1. for 1 month and then $14.00 per month. THAT IS NOT What was shown online nor what we discussed. So already I have to resolve an issue. Not what I expected and now a bit leery.

Review.Titre: Needless file reloading
Review.Contenu: When editing a file online and saving it, the entire process of reloading it again must be done if you do another edit. Very inconvenient.

Review.Titre: Great service but one thing i don't…
Review.Contenu: Great service but one thing i don't like is how i can't see what I will be charge for renewal online.

Review.Titre: Consultant was able to help but abuse…
Review.Contenu: Consultant was able to help but abuse management was unreachable to help with my issue.

Review.Titre: Confused and struggling
Review.Contenu: As soon as I setup my account, there is no agent to speak with online, why?  I received my domain, uploaded my files but the image is not appearing as it does on my desktop, why?  I have a consultant but no way to chat with them but by calling a number, why not online?

Review.Titre: my domain is not online yet?
Review.Contenu: Had a small issue but got a an email right away and fixed my problem  in a politely and quick manner thank you

Review.Titre: Reinstalling images literally takes 5 hours…
Review.Contenu: Reinstalling images literally takes hours...  and for some reason I've had to sit through these 5 hour reinstalls because it just would stop letting me connect to it.  It would say its online but I couldn't do anything with it, so I just decided to reinstall the image so I can even use it.I really like the millions of features but I think I was given a really buggy server, I don't know what's going on but I haven't gotten to use my server at all yet.

Review.Titre: I did not like having to call to cancel…
Review.Contenu: I did not like having to call to cancel my contract.

Review.Contenu: The tools on this app are not easy to use and understand. I CREATED a domain and STRUGGLED to connect with droplets DNS server but it takes long time and till not working. I have tried to follow some you-tube videos to understand the IONOS platform.I just deleted all subscriptions, and I am not using any IONOS product now, but they took 119.00 from my credit card on November 27, 2022,  so I like to ask IONOS  please refund my money

Review.Titre: Good but...
Review.Contenu: The site offers a lot of features but it is confusing to navigate.It is also not always clear what you are buying or signing -up for.

Review.Titre: I have always found Ionos to be really…
Review.Contenu: ========================================Update: Just as I left them a glowing review, they go down hill. All their inbound email communications are blocked, I'm getting payment reminders for contracts that have been cancelled (only to be inaccurately told that the payment reminder was for another  completely unrelated contract that I have with them - which was not in arrears either), and now I can't update the domain Admin-C and Reg-C information as the information I'm providing is apparently inaccurate. Evidently there's something going on with this company and they're having major teething problems. =======================================I have always found Ionos to be really good, I have used them for several instant domain and web hosting packages for a number of years, and they all live up to expectation and in all honesty, I can't think of any using any competitor of theirs.  Although one time, years ago, I did try using Microsoft Azure as a web hosting provider where you end up selling your sanity just to get one web page on the 'interwebs' never mind a whole site! However, with Ionos, it's literally a new clicks of the mouse, and boom, website is online!

Review.Titre: Don't fully understand what we are…
Review.Contenu: Don't fully understand what we are purchasing or how to access it without going further into the website.

Review.Titre: Domain registration is a little more…
Review.Contenu: Domain registration is a little more than other places and there is no discount for multiple years. SSL is an extra $20/year, which is more than the domain itself.

Review.Titre: Hard to Set Up
Review.Contenu: Ionos makes the user guess each step in buying a URL and hosting space. They don't even provide video to show you how to get it set up. It's ridiculous. However, they still get 3 stars because the overseas help desk they contract with is very good. I've used them plenty to fix things that Ionos's carelessness brokes

Review.Titre: I have constantly problem with my…

Review.Contenu: 1) Inflexible address registration (apartment before street address)2) site inverted street address (street before number)3) Business hosting option hard to find4) Server down first time I tried to register

Review.Contenu: Honestly, I’m having a hard time. I can’t sign in on my tablet, I can’t properly edit and create my website because the view doesn’t work on my phone. I purchased a domain but when I tried to make an email it says I don’t own one so this purchase is just so I can try again. It was remarkably easy to purchase this but so far, all I’ve done is hemorrhage $ for products I CAN’T USE… This is not what I envisioned from IONOS.

Review.Titre: everything is good till need customer care
Review.Contenu: everything is good till need customer care... especially for us in other countries. Send an email and are replied to after over 12 hours, to complete a single issue may require over 4 days for a mere three to and fro communication. would be better if had a direct chat service, cause even calls overseas are costly.

Review.Titre: confusing

The interface is different from when I ordered the first time even though it's just 15 minutes difference. overall it's very confusing

Review.Titre: Some of the pages don't walk or guide…
Review.Contenu: Some of the pages don't walk or guide you through the process,  so you wind up going to the navigation bars to add certain options to your domain.

Review.Contenu: TOO MANY upsell offers. Slows down the process and too confusing.

Review.Titre: Good

Review.Titre: Great
Review.Contenu: Great web hosting services

Review.Titre: Definitely thought I was getting a…
Review.Contenu: Definitely thought I was getting a domain for $1. But when I logged in it became $10. The website is wonky on my phone.  I got so frustrated I almost went to another company. There is a overlay at the top so you have to reduce your screen so that it’s so tiny you can’t read it. They really do need to adjust their site for mobile. After all they create and sell websites, it’s not great that they can’t get their website going.

Review.Titre: Not user friendly via navigating…
Review.Contenu: Not user friendly via navigating purchase.  Price changed after I signed in.

Review.Titre: Was good, not so much now.
Review.Contenu: I used Ionos for a year and have loved their service, especially their promotional offers.UPDATE: Their service was really good a year ago. Recently, before the expiry of my contracts, the login page has shown multiple failures.And now that my contract has expired, I have to pay $100 just to get my domain and website out of IONOS.

Review.Titre: In spite of complying with everything…
Review.Contenu: In spite of complying with everything customer service told me to do, my domain transfer to IONOS was constantly delayed due to an IONOS issue. It’s unacceptable. My time is valuable and every time I had to call customer service for an issue that the previous rep said was handled - it wasn’t.

Review.Titre: Just did not seem intuitive to purchase…
Review.Contenu: Just did not seem intuitive to purchase domain and related email. inadequate explanation around email products. Will also be creatng website would have like to be a more inclusive for all things necessary to assemble such a common package.

Review.Titre: My server acts up
Review.Contenu: My server acts up.  It slows down to a crawl then gives error messages that are wrong.And does not notify me of the problem.Very disturbing for today's technology.I even went through the pain of a new upgraded server within the last 12 months and still have the same issues.I am selling off my websites so I no longer have to deal with this.

Review.Titre: Not up to the mark
Review.Contenu: Not up to the mark, please activate chat support, you guys always deactivate which is not fair.the website always shows this error: even have activated performance level 3 shows this error: Error 503 - Service UnavailableThe server is currently unavailable.I troubleshot by myself as I am an expert but still there is no solution. More than 500 Per month traffic and still this problem , i deleted almost every single plugin .i changed theme but problem is still there ,

Review.Titre: This rating may be more about me than…
Review.Contenu: This rating may be more about me than it is about IONOS.  I just purchased multiple domain names and now have more than one account. This is making it difficult to connect my webpage with my preferred domain.  I am sure I will feel better once I get more knowledge and skill.

Review.Titre: It took me several trials to get it done
Review.Contenu: I had to go through the entire process at least 5 times in 12 hours to be able to finish it successfully.Your system kept saying "Unfortunately, the requested payment method is not available for this order..."

Review.Titre: Upcharge upcharge upcharge
Review.Contenu: They work and my sites are doing well but they upcharge for everything, monthly.  May be inexpensive to choose hosting package and domain name but everything else such as ssl cost more money-  literally no services except BASIC hosting included.  I might go with a more inclusive package possibly with another company next time.

Review.Titre: false unlimited storage actually has 260k file limit
Review.Contenu: 1 thing i am upset about is you sold me the service with unlimited storage yet once i paid and opened the account portal it said limit of 260k files, this is false advertising and fraud!!!!!!! i have only 2 websites up and its half used already but only 3.5 gb of actual data!!! for future you should disclose this file limit prior to selling the ""unlimited"" plan!!! I had considered contacting an attorney about this as I am sure others have!!!!

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate, Difficulty setting up
Review.Contenu: Easy to navigate, but unable to locate my domain, I paid for. It shows on my credit statement the money was taken, ionos only shows payment for email. It's been frustrating because without my domain, I can't set up my email for my business. Difficulty setting up my business email

Review.Titre: Solid hosting but you need to pay more than you thought you need to
Review.Contenu: Solid hosting, but they offer only one email per account, no matter how many domains and they offer one SSL certificate per account (shared hosting) you will need to pay for the rest, which are quite more expensive than normal rates for something other hosting companies offer FOR FREEI won't be renewing with them for sure

Review.Titre: Web builder is not flexible enough
Review.Contenu: Your prices are good But your services for me are limited. I was hoping to use the web builder but is is not user friendly so I moved to Wix where it is not so difficult to change the fist page of a site. Very disappointing.I build sires every day. Some are only up until their house has sold,Your product is not flexible enough

Review.Titre: Is it just me or do I keep ordering domains witout access to any of them
Review.Contenu: I feel like i keep ordering and or paying for the same thing over and over again. I dont now how many domains I ave at this point, I do know however that i cant access any of them. Good sevice minus all the extras. Its honestly just too much for a beginner like me, overwhelming. I think you guys should hold off on pushing so many side add ons, until you know that a customer knows the use for that product right now,  how to get the most out of that product.ThanksNikita Solomon

Review.Titre: Update (case resolved after speaking with agent on the phone)
Review.Contenu: Initiated a domain transfer 1 month before expiry. 2 weeks later transfer was not completed. Tried multiple times to reach out to customer support with no answer. Now with 5 days left before expiration I learn that my contract is cancelled without notice. They say I have to process the order again while the price has doubled since the first order. Very poor customer experience.

Review.Titre: Linux Servers and database servers are…
Review.Contenu: Linux Servers and database servers are too slow. Limit of number of files on the server is very limiting.The service, especially in the last few years, is pretty reliable and uptime is good.Control panel is not cpanel, and is pretty slow.Database size limit is, well, limiting.Customer service s very responsive, though first level support knowledge leave some to be desired, and their limited direct communication with higher level support can be frustrating .Domain volume discount is desired.Unlimited SSL product is great.

Review.Titre: Need acceptable telephone number format.
Just had another phone call with Ionos…
Review.Contenu: Just had another phone call with Ionos trying to sell me ranking coach and the person calling was very rude. I've decided to move all my accounts somewhere else.This is a very hard decision because they have the best customer service I've ever had to use. I've been with them for a few years and have over 20 domains and mail accounts. I have initiated the transfer of everything for now and we'll see how that goes. I can see me coming back just for the customer service alone, there's none better. I've changed the stars just because the customer service is that good.

Review.Titre: Hidden costs
Review.Contenu: A little disappointed that all the costs are not upfront.  It seems like every time I hit another button there was something else to buy.  I would appreciate it if the total cost was displayed on the front page then I would not have been trapped halfway through paying for items I did not know were a separate cost.

Review.Titre: Too many extraneous marketing screens make ordering a hassle
Review.Contenu: New extraneous marketing steps add confusion to the ordering process. Why must is be so complex and so many clicks to order a domain? The main purchase path through the IONOS website is too complex - all the "Special Offers" annoyances do NOT add value.Also domain pricing is cheaper elsewhere, even with the included private registration which is great.

Review.Titre: This is far easier to get charged for…
Review.Contenu: This is far easier to get charged for than it is to use. And the 24/7 assistance is pretty vague after dark altho the girls that called me that first day were on point.. I still don't have a usable work email much less a website & it's just not what I hoped.

Review.Titre: My contract is locked, but money is deducted from my card
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Virtual Server Cloud XL. Ionos sent me a email telling me that my order had been rejected. They also deducted $2 from my credit card. I can't cancel the service or request refund because the contract is locked.Update: I received the refund. I hope I will be able to order a server from my country.

Review.Titre: Some of the things were confusing and…
Review.Contenu: Some of the things were confusing and would be helpful if mail and other necessities were included just to keep it on affordable side, especially people on small budget and just starting out

Review.Titre: It was a really confusing process..
Review.Contenu: It was a really confusing process... I am a very tech savvy person and it took me several times to order my domain from my control panel and then to pay for it.  I did not notice you did not take Visa. But so far I am happy with your product, just not the layout of your website.

Review.Titre: More of a feedback than review?!
Review.Contenu: Well… Been with you a little while. Had a few rocky spots but mostly ok-good. Main complaint is that I can’t pay ahead for all the services. That single month thing is killing me! I became “woke” and pulled the plug on Gmail Stalker©️. And migrated away from all things Google. Just found out I could use an email in my package to receive billing notices. That helped in a small way but still burdened by the monthly billing.Unfortunately, because of the hours spent on the phone, plus the service interruptions for a $4 outstanding balance; I’m always searching for a new provider. As I read back through this I realize this was a review. Oh well… kind of the same.

Review.Titre: It's "OK"
Review.Contenu: I've been a customer for ten years.  Its "OK" does the bare minimum of what I need, email and simple (no-sales) websites.  I just went to edit my business site and found that the host (RiverviewPlaceApartments.com) was dropped.  I don't understand why.  I just re-acquired it.

Review.Titre: I like the ease of building a website
Review.Contenu: I like the ease of building a website. The issue I have with 1&1 is the pricing. It seems like no matter which package you choose, there is always more to pay for. I feel that a lot of the "extra" features should be bundled into a package so that you're actually able to set up the website and get started, as opposed to setting up, then continuing to have to add products to the package in order to utilize the services available. It starts off at a decent price, but once you add everything that is actually needed, the price is far higher than it would have been if you simply built the website with another website builder.

Review.Titre: Started off ok but every month seemed…
Review.Contenu: Started off ok but every month seemed to find something else you needed. Then it became just a money drain. Cancelled four weeks ago what I thought was the whole package turns out there were loads of other little packages so now find them removing money from my account for services I thought I’d cancelled. No one replied to any emails regarding this. Really just a waste of time and money with these people who just bog you down with endless buy this, try this on you signed up for this prattle.

Review.Titre: No problems other than when I set up…
Review.Contenu: No problems other than when I set up WebMail all of my browsers mysteriously got set to use MS Edge as my default mailto: link handler.  MS Edge was set to launch WebMail.  I certainly didn't do this by accident.  If IONOS did this it was NOT GOOD and very presumptive.

Review.Titre: Using Safari 11.1.2 which still works…
Review.Contenu: Using Safari 11.1.2 which still works for online stores, banking and many other sites, pages here did not load quickly or indicate that anything was happening, causing me to reload and repeat my transactions.Otherwise I'm happy with how easy it was to find and purchase my domain.

Review.Titre: The move from the EOL services to the…
Review.Contenu: The move from the EOL services to the newer services has been okay at best, there are DNS configuration settings (and mail) that we are having to remake ourselves, not ideal.Other than this, their support has been quite good, and their up time is also quite good. Pretty soon here I'll know how good their API is.

Review.Titre: I have been with 1&1 (IONOS) for many…
Review.Contenu: I have been with 1&1 (IONOS) for many years and to date support has been adequate but yesterday I wanted support on my hosting options and was transferred to  the hosting specialist, the line was awful, breaking up and together with a strong accent was impossible to understand! I asked to be called back, I thought she responded that she would but the fact that I heard nothing, probably not so.So today I will be looking for a provider that at least has UK based support and doesn't rely on VOIP!

Review.Titre: Cannot cancel
Review.Contenu: Update: Tara from ionos reached out to handle the issue. They have taken off the charges. I am keeping my fingers crossed that there won’t be any more threatening emails for sending to collection will come. Changing from one star to three. Still taking two stars away because this was made unnecessarily hard. ——-I have cancelled the service, got the refund but they keep on sending me emails with invoice pending. Today got another email that they will send it to collections. Tried logging in but the account doesn’t exist. They tried to renew account last year as well. Not sure what to do.

Review.Titre: Please check your renewal pricing and…
Review.Contenu: Please check your renewal pricing and offers, for me to be associated to you for long terms kindly make  affordable renewals a marginal rise in cost upto 10% is acceptable in renewals not 10 times.

Review.Titre: Ok but dishonest pricing
Review.Contenu: Ok. ... but what's upsetting is that most of the time with new domain registrations it says $1 for the first year and then at the end of the checkout it shows $10 (no way to get the $1 offer back). STRANGE to say at least.

Review.Titre: I have used 1&1 for several years
Review.Contenu: I have used 1&1 for several years, on and off.  Their services are good.  Their prices are good. Their website is kind of terrible.  I don't do auto-pay and it is next to impossible to figure out how to renew and pay for my items when I choose.

Review.Titre: My contract was canceled, but now has a good explanation
Review.Contenu: Okay, I currently accept your excuses. I think I have mentioned hard words, but if you have explained that issue rich in details as you did now, I would be satisfied. Your grade as 3 stars I will persist because there are 2 things I felt unsafe navigating by IONOS portal: You don’t provide a close account button and there is no way to exclude my personal credit card from there. These are essencial resources any user ought to have under its control. By the way, I changed to another web hosting provider because I needed to improve the speed of registration and to upload my website. Thanks a lot!

Review.Titre: godaddy web site can kiss my ass
Review.Contenu: godaddy web site can kiss my ass.  they are absolute rip off...but your web site is somewhat of a pain in the ass to use.  thank god godaddy has competition.  i only register domain names so i can eventually resale for lage mark up.  at least im honest

Review.Titre: IONOS Poor Support: Resolved
Review.Contenu: Update 2: Refund was received. Issue resolved.Update: IONOS has contacted me via email for a refund of the test charge. I will re-update review as received.Message 1: I purchased a .COM domain name at IONOS via PayPal. As I did not receive my domain in the dashboard, I contacted support via live chat. They stated that I had a previous account with uncleared balance. I kindly confirmed that this was an already cancelled contract and that IONOS support (Rulio Oscar) confirmed that invoice was cancelled. Even though, my domain was never delivered and neither refunded. I have emailed then twice since, and they are not even replying.

Review.Titre: In the past few years
Review.Contenu: In the past few years, I believe that a one-size-fits-all approach to customer service has been taken.  For the record, my business with 1&1 goes back over a decade.

Review.Titre: Disappointed with the basic store…
Review.Contenu: Disappointed with the basic store templates. Difficult to edit templates. Will keep the .com domain and add a .de one. I like 1&1 they are very reliable. I have experience with them in Germany.

Review.Titre: I suggest you add better labels/links…
Review.Contenu: I suggest you add better labels/links to your website

Review.Titre: Very confusing to purchase a domain
Review.Contenu: Very confusing to purchase a domain.  The CHECKOUT symbol is a tiny little basket (cart) placed inconspicuously.  It needs to go on the bottom of the page and be larger so we can find it.

Review.Titre: i can't sign in into my account even…
Review.Contenu: i can't sign in into my account even with the right password i saved to my google account, I'll have to input the same username and password several times before it will accept

Review.Titre: Was way easier before they made…
Review.Contenu: Was way easier before they made mistakes.Lost several of my premium domains because of their customer nonservice.The people were not the problem.  It was their phone system that was completely static noise.

Review.Titre: IONIS HAS HUGE PROBLEMS WITH MS OUTLOOK…
Review.Contenu: I am revising this to 3 stars since the problem seems to have gone away after a few days of massive issues. However, I do strongly suspect the Ionos was the at the core of the problem that cost us two days of productivity. All outgoing email was getting rejected by Outlook addresses as "Access denied, banned sender". Gmail from the same IP had no issue, and microsoft forums single out 1 & 1, so it's clearly something sloppy, or a bad business practice that raised Microsoft's flags. Look at the numerous other complaints here... It's not just us... Fix your security, clean up your act, and stop causing us downtime and embarassing bounce backs. This is is serious.

Review.Titre: Slow admin site - no easy plan comparisons
Review.Contenu: Slow admin site.No clear comparison page of individual packages.My converted contract from my old one was much more expensive. Glad I finally changed it. Will shop for alternatives.

Review.Titre: New domain promo price $5 for first yr…
Review.Contenu: New domain promo price $5 for first yr then $11 per yr afterwards, but when it came to pay it was $8.50 instead of $5. Not a huge issue but confusing and annoying.

Review.Titre: Navigation is bad
Review.Contenu: Navigation is bad. I had to repeat steps and the explanation of add-on products is just fair. Couldn't make an informed decision at the time of sale. That cost you money.

Review.Titre: good company
Website is slow
Review.Contenu: Website is slow, finding information about plans is not straightforward.  Annual billing instead of monthly does not seem to be an option, or if it is it's not easy to find on the website.

Review.Titre: it is still hard to navigate
Review.Contenu: it is still hard to navigate, had to go back 3 times to finf link for transferring domains. It should be on drill down menu.Could not transfer multiple domains in one entry

Review.Titre: Have to transfer domain instead of simply assigning it to included domain.
Review.Contenu: The domain was already in the same contract. It would be easier if allowing domains to be assigned to the included domains instead of having to do a transfer.

Review.Titre: Took four tries to purchase domain
Review.Contenu: Took four tries to purchase domain. Kept saying country and state were invalid entries.

Review.Titre: Online Chat Support Not Great
Review.Contenu: Ionos in general is great. The last online chat help was not great. She kept disappearing for long periods and not responding. The entire call to do one thing took 30 min.

Review.Titre: I don't know
Review.Contenu: I don't even know. It seems like they said a bunch was included but now I'm being charged for each. Its still really affordable but a little frustrating

Review.Titre: needs online support i dont want having…
Review.Contenu: needs online support i dont want having to call be my only option for support. and its a major pain in my behind trying to activate my domain

Review.Titre: Overall satisfactory
Review.Contenu: Overall satisfactory, but sometimes it's difficult to navigate the site, since their page examples don't always match what I see on my computer desktop...

Review.Titre: Lots of problems, but...
Review.Contenu: Lots of problems, but Chin in customer service was competent enough that I am taking a chance on continuing using them....

Review.Titre: I feel like somehow I'll get cheated
Review.Contenu: I feel like somehow I'll get cheated. Like with GoDaddy. Everything looks okay so far.

Review.Titre: Support is horrible and disrespectful
Review.Contenu: Once my hosting account is fixed, I will change this to a 4. The only reason it is NOT a 5 is because some of their representatives when you call just put you on hold without permission, even while your in the middle of talking which is a concern for me because it took me almost a week to reach a reprensentative in the hosting department that told me she would call me on Monday.I signed up online and bought the web expert windows hosting plan but the transaction did not go through so I had to call and I think the rep I spoke with thought I was referring to their Linux web expert hosting plan. Which also means the rep did not listen because I specifically said windows lol.Beyond the horrbile support, I like IONOS. I like the website and the way things are setup. Their hosting webspace allows you to direct all of your domains towards specific folders that can house applications and for instance that is where our Umbraco 10 project sits, is on the webspace in a folder call 'App'. But, since it only shows .net 4 as the framework (Umbraco 10 requires at least .net 6) most of the features of my site are not working on IONOS hosting but does work on my previous hosting that I still have until the end of next month. I suggest IONOS clean up their mess and fix my hosting account before I cancel for the 30 day money back guarantee!!!

Review.Titre: The support was great
Review.Contenu: The support was great so 5 Stars on that . But their plans are a bit wired, for example within the same company if you own two accounts you can not push a domain name from one to the another with hosting unless if you pay for 1 extra year, so 4 star for that !

Review.Titre: CS was excellent
Review.Contenu: Overall i would rate this a 5 for services I currently use. I was switching to them for email hosting, but i have awhile left on my hosting on another provider that starts with go and ends with they stink....So i will likely be switching that to ionos also. But my only drawback was i had to contact CS to setup my email since the domain was on another provider and i couldnt find the settings to do that thru help. The agent set it up and all i had to do was change my mx record and it all worked great.

Review.Titre: David P
Review.Contenu: David P. was very helpful in helping me understand builder options for my woefully out of date website. Give him a raise out of the 12 years of hosting fees I paid for please.

Review.Titre: I would like to be able to cancel my account online without calling
Review.Contenu: The website made it easy, however I would like to be able to cancel my account online without calling. I know you want to try and save the business, but I object to Take Overs. The person I talked to was professional and didn't pressure me to stay.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service marred by a broken interface for iPhone
Review.Contenu: What made the experience great was that Raymond managed to get what I needed done, even if I could barely communicate with him! The chat, however, is useless on the iPhone app: The screen crops all the messages, leaving you to figure out the meaning of what was said only with a few words.

Review.Titre: Quick and to the point
Review.Contenu: Quick and to the point addressing the billing issue I inquired.

Review.Titre: Neil seemed surprised that I was just…
Review.Contenu: Neil seemed surprised that I was just asking whether it was possible to get a domain and then host with another service (not IONOS). I found his reaction unprofessional. That being said, he was friendly most of the time and answered my question. Hence a 4 start instead of a 5 star review

Review.Titre: I appreciate the options for contacting customer service!
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the fact that they are now willing to work with me via email. As a hard-of-hearing person, I dislike trying to interact on the phone.I also appreciate that they have someone available on a holiday. This is my time to work on my site, so having help now is great.

Review.Titre: Some buggy products but superior support
Review.Contenu: I had recently submitted a very negative review about a few bugs encountered while setting up a new site. However, what sent me into a blind rage was the sudden onslaught of messages and calls from Indian web developers and marketing firms, all trying to sell me their goods. I mistakenly attributed it to IONOS selling my phone number to the marketers. However, after calming down and thinking it through, I realize I was wrong. All the while developing the site (under a temporary URL), things were quiet as I worked through the issues. It wasn't until my new domain was propagated to the web w/registration that the onslaught began. This is NOT something under the providers control. Even so, they did their best to minimize my interruptions and for that I am grateful. Since I ranted, their support staff have been great in helping me deal with the remaining issues and my site is benefitting greatly. I apologize for my prior rant and assign no blame to IONOS for the fine job they are doing. I should have realized what was actually happening but I haven't been doing any coding for about 15 years and forgot how this process works.

Review.Titre: Grateful for Customer Service Basic Troubleshooting
Review.Contenu: I appreciate that they were available and did what they could when I ran into something that needed troubleshooting.The problem was eventually resolved.I am grateful for their chat and phone service.

Review.Contenu: Pretty fast response, but I solved the problem internally.
