Review.Contenu: The problem I caused was explained to me and I corrected it. The popup error hasn't occurred again.Thanks Jennivie.

Review.Titre: I've been with IONOS for years...
Review.Contenu: I've been with IONOS for years. My experience, for the most part, has been very positive. Maybe my expectations are too high...but the one area I do find a tiny bit frustrating, is what seems like IONOS inability to respond to concerns outside of IONOS defined solutions. For example, I recently expressed a concern regarding billing, and asked if it is possible to be billed annually as opposed to monthly, or, is it possible for IONOS to indicate the amount owning on the invoice, in both $USD and 4CDN dollars.  IONOS responds quickly, and very politely – but the responses are generic. IONOS seems to be unable to respond to my specific concern, if my concern falls outside of the present solutions IONOS is able to provide. That said, I would absolutely recommend IONOS: 4.73 out of 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Tech was good
Review.Contenu: Tech was good, particularly helpful to those not computer geeks. Emotionally cool even when things were not going well.

Review.Titre: No upsell
Review.Contenu: No upsell, that was AWESOME.  LONG HOLD TIMES!So the overall experience is 4 Stars, but the actual person helping me is 5 stars.   Really wish you guys would seperate that in your ratings.

Review.Titre: Almost impossible to cancel contracts
Review.Contenu: Update: Finally, the problem and my dissatisfaction have been solved. I don't understand the "need for a cancellations department" if it used to be simple and hassle-free in the control panel interface. Anyway, the problem solved. Thanks :)---It is getting harder and harder to cancel contracts you no longer need. I have contacted the online support, and they can't help me. The only chance is to call or be called by the "enabled" department. This is bulls**t! I will never use IONOS services again.

Review.Titre: The customer service rep was very nice
Review.Contenu: The customer service rep was very nice. Your actual service though not so much if I am trying to keep a business alive I would never be able to upkeep with all the drop outs in service. Again as for the rep very nice and professional.

Review.Contenu: I was assisted by Janice during my call. We arrived at a point where she was unable to resolve my situation. Yet she took it upon herself to find a way forward. Thank you Janice for your solution that saved us all from a drawn out process.

Review.Titre: Love the real humans on the phone, and easy access to…
Review.Contenu: I love that it's easy to phone for help instead of go through a chatbot first, and that there is a real, live human able to help who answers the phone. Clean looking, easy to navigate dashboard on the back end is a wonderful change from cluttered and clunky cpanel interfaces. Feels like Ionos is truly taking the goal of  making a positive and convenient customer experience to heart.

Review.Titre: The staff was very helpful
Review.Contenu: The staff was very helpful, professional and makes up for my only issue with Ionos aside from the random unprovoked calls. The other issue which is major in my opinion is the cancellation system, it's overly complicated and is too pushy on not allowing you to easily cancel. I understand some push but theirs is far too much. Other than that I have zero complaints and once my life is less filled and I have some free time I will go back to them even with my concerns.

Review.Titre: Feedback and special request
Review.Contenu: I appreciate your quick response and detailed information. However, the exchange rate of dollar to Naira in Nigeria is extremely high (almost 1,000 Naira per 1$. I’m tempted to move my website to a cheaper platform. So I will appreciate information on how to make money with my website though it is still at developing stage. Also, I don’t mind if there could be reduction in dollar rate for customers like me in Nigeria.Thank you very much.

Review.Contenu: I received great help and assistance from them. I just get frustrated by all the necessary upgrades to protect the site and create something basic. Review.Titre: No Payment Receipts
Review.Contenu: The operational aspects of IONOS have served me very well for over 10 years: uptime, pricing, customer support, etc.  There is one big exception when it comes to accounting.  They cannot provide a receipt for invoices you have paid.  That is fine until you get audited by the IRS.  IONOS only can show a $0 balance but not provide an invoice as being paid.  How hard can that be??

I have two contracts with IONOS, and I want to ensure the domain orders are applied to specific ones. This needs to be a part of the checkout process.

Review.Titre: Good and fast hosting service, but with support problems
Review.Contenu: Ionos provides a very fast and automatized workflow. I only had two insues. The first was the lack of direct contact in website. I don't believe that trust pilot is a good place for it. So I hope this change this on future. The second was that when I was trying to get refund to change to other plan they answered me using a template email for balance credit pefarps to credit card refund. While I understand the necessity of use email template for fast costumer support. Use the same template for different answers type create non necessary negative and confusing experience. I hope they also expand their number of email templates in the future. If you want a very good and fast web hosting service and don't care with these two problems they have on the moment of review. So go ahead, ionos is one of bigger and better web hosting service in 2023.

Review.Titre: Prompt and clear on-demand live…

Review.Titre: great cheap hosting and domains with awesome bonuses
Review.Contenu: I originally went with Ionos since they had good cheap domains with private registration, but wow, they offer great features for cheap. They give a free 2GB email server with every domain which is awesome, and infinite forwarding domains to forward to that email address and allows for infinite aliases through that. Their customer support has always been available and ready, although I haven't really needed to contact them. Works great with my Github site. Their VPSes are very cheap compared to the competition, and are very reliable and work just fine for everything I throw at them. 2 cores and 6GB for only 15$ is awesome!! Only issue I have is lack of locations, and only having East Coast servers. Other than that, Ionos has been very great for hosting my game servers, and I will be back for all of my hosting needs :3

Review.Titre: I moved my Wordpress site from another…
Review.Contenu: I moved my Wordpress site from another host and purchased a new domain and one year host service. They were helpful in getting my Wordpress site moved and working properly. The charges for this service were reasonable in my opinion. It has been more than a month and my site has been up on Ionos with no interruptions.  A few weeks after signing up, an aggressive salesman called me on my cell and sold me some add on services - Ranking Coach and others. I cancelled some of them right away and decided to try Ranking Coach. Overall it was helpful, however it required a lot of my time to implement changes to my site and time is short right now. When I called customer service for help they often couldn't help me with technical Wordpress maters and the wait times were not great. I also received several pushy sales pitches for more services during calls for help which I don't appreciate. It was difficult to cancel Ranking Coach. I tried canceling once and they invoiced me for another month - despite the fact that I called back per their requirements. I called a second time back they promised to cancel and waive the invoice fee. I hope it sticks this time. I intend to continue with Ionos unless problems continue. Hopefully I can give them a 5 star review at some point.

Review.Titre: Good VPS services
Review.Contenu: I currently have 3 VPS (S tier) with Ionos for $2 each per month which is a very good deal. I have the VPS's running anonymous search querys to earn crypto rewards for performing this service and on average the success rate of the querys is about 85-90%. I love how I can choose the server location to different locations in Europe, I wish they had more locations in Asia though. Overall I would recommend their services the only improvements I would recommend that they make would be to add servers in Asia (like in Japan) and for people that have multiple VPS servers it would be awesome if I could consolidate multiple contracts into a single monthly payment instead of having separate $2 payments for each contract every month on my credit card.

Review.Titre: I have been working  with Ionos, for…
Review.Contenu: I have been working  with Ionos, for the past 4 years.And I have to say so far my experience has been incredible. One thing I have to highlight because I think it's the most important aspect of this partnership and it is also the reason why I recommend this company for every startup or small business like myself. (That has to deal with everything on their own) I have to say they support team are very helpful and incredible fast. In all these years every problem that I had with the system or products has been greatly solved very fast.  I would hope for the future that  Ionos always keep these high quality service and customer care.The prices are very competitive, maybe in the medium high end. But for everything else that you are getting I think it's okay.I would also want to mention, the very special deal that they have for the first year as an offer that's very helpful for startups to start. Thaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaanks!
